document.full_text: apple inc must clear up "a string of open questions" about user data stored by its iphone, ipad, and other devices, a spokesman for germany's consumer protection ministry said on thursday.
document.title: germany says wants clarity on iphone data storage
lines_and_colors: apple inc must clear up "a string of open questions" about user data stored by its iphone, ipad, and other devices, a spokesman for germany's consumer protection ministry said on thursday.
